name: EVERSOL
description: EVERSOL is a community driven project based on the Binance Smart Chain with a real use case. $ESOL Holders will receive $USDT automatically to their wallets, get a chance to be among the daily SOLANA ($SOL) winners and enjoy the NFTs ecosystem. At phase 4 of our Roadmap, we are planning to launch our own NFT Marketplace. This is how it’s going to work : Our HOLDers with a minimum Holding amount of $ESOL will be able to mint their own NFT collections on our NFT Marketplace. In order to create a successful NFT collection, a great design and Marketing is highly required. We’ll make at their disposition a Team of Designers that will work exclusively for EVERSOL and the influencers that have already joined our Project and that will join us later will Market their NFT collection and give it more exposure. Also, there will be Giveaways for : Best NFT collection + Most Sales + Most innovative NFTs and so on.
